name: Biomarkers
author: Eng. Tania Perez Ramirez << tperezdevelopment@gmail.com >> Cuban Center for Neurosciences
description: This module is useful for detect biomarkers through generalized linear models with  penalties and resampling thecniques for validation. Paper reference:https://www.frontiersin.org/articles/10.3389/fnins.2017.00749/full

inputs.description: In this file must be saved all the matrix (data, labels and independent variable) that this plugin needs to run. If is empty the upload of file will be independent.
inputs.name: Same file for all the matrix (data, labels and independent variable)

inputs.description: This is the .mat input file of the data matrix subjects information. A matrix of number of subjects x variables.
inputs.name: Data Matrix

inputs.description: This is the .mat input file of the labels for the classification of the data example. A matrix of number of subjects x label.
inputs.name: Labels Matrix

inputs.description: This is the .mat input file of independent variable. Usually is the age.
inputs.name: Matrix of independent variable

inputs.description: Name of the Matrix in the file Data Matrix for load. Sometimes in the same file was saved more than one Matrix for that is necessary this input parameter.
inputs.name: Name of the Data Matrix

inputs.description: Name of the Matrix in the file Labels Matrix for load. Sometimes in the same file was saved more than one Matrix for that is necessary this input parameter.
inputs.name: Name of the Matrix in the file Labels Matrix

inputs.description: Name of the Matrix in the file Matrix of independent variable for load. Sometimes in the same file was saved more than one Matrix for that is necessary this input parameter.
inputs.name: Name of the Matrix in the file Matrix of independent variable

inputs.description: If this is selected will be calculate Indfeat.m routine for selecting independent features for modeling problems
inputs.name: Select indfeat option

inputs.description: Percent of variable for generate the samples
inputs.name: Percent of variable for generate the samples

inputs.description: Percent of subjects for generate the samples
inputs.name: Percent of subjects for generate the samples

inputs.description: Number of times for random sample
inputs.name: Number of times for random sample

inputs.description: Percent of the data to train
inputs.name: Percent of the data to train

inputs.description: Weight for estimate the lambda. Separed by space or eat. This list of alphas must be between 0.01 and 1. Currently alpha < 0.01 is not reliable, unless you supply your own lambda sequence. To find optimal tuning parameters, fit a total of 10 alpha values
inputs.name: Weight for estimate the lambda. Separed by space or eat

inputs.description: Number of times for generate data train and test data
inputs.name: Number of times for generate data train and test data

output-files.description: A folder containing the output file for Biomarkers module
output-files.name: Output folder

description: this is the biomarkers module descriptor
